result.title: Multiplexed surface conformal µECoG
result.description: Prototype and report of prototype assessment. The prototype will integrate the developed capabilities of multiplexing technology and the novel µECoG designs. The report will assess the device performance in terms of number of active sites, site dimension, electronic noise, and maximum sampling frequency.

result.title: System integration of first multiplexed neural interfaces with digital output
result.description: Discrete electronics, ASIC, data management and packaging developments to integrate the developed small area neural interfaces with frequency-domain multiple access (FDMA) multiplexing technique of up to 8x8 recording sites into electrophysiological recording systems. This first ASIC also includes the A/D conversion of all the multiplexed channels but not any digital post-processing oriented to data compression. This deliverable improves the initial description of D2.1 by introducing a novel continuous-time multiplexing capability, whose number of channels can be up-scaled in the subsequent deliverables.
